mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.user_name as userName, u.photo as avatar, r.id as relationId, true as followed FROM user_relation as r left join user_info as u on r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.follow_user_id = #{userId} and r.follow_state = ${@com.tt98.pojo.Enum.FollowStateEnum@FOLLOW.code} ORDER BY u.id desc
